description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Yet more humour and peril!  Can you survive the zombies? Can you endure the girls! Will you ever make it home?  A one player point and click adventure game.  With multiple different endings dependant on choices made (entering codes from last game allows for even more variation!) 3D stereoscopic version included (red/cyan 3d glasses needed) Game contains some adult humour and innuendo
